item.title: The World You Were Born in No Longer Exists
item.description: The moments have passed at a play. I only have the wisdom age can bring. There are times when I remember those old days of plum, innocent youth and wonder where it has all gone. It has changed so much these past few years. Some things I don’t even recognize. Sometimes I don’t recognize myself. Some nights long while ago, when my grandmother was still alive I thought of things. I thought of death.

item.title: Covid Is Science's Chernobyl
item.description: The Gray Mirror article by Curtis Yarvin
